T02TD2185E:51b-0: @51b ` // phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi 'grel pa mu tig gi phreng ba bzhugs /
T02TD2185E:51b-2: # // phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi 'grel pa mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba //
T02TD2185E:51b-3: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:51b-4: dang la bsnyen pa'i rim pa ni //
T02TD2185E:52a-2: ba yi rnam lngas byi dor bya //
T02TD2185E:52a-3: dbus su lnga ldan sbrul dgu dgod //
T02TD2185E:52a-4: mdun du bum pa bzed zhal dang //
T02TD2185E:52a-5: mchod pa rnams lnga bcas par dgod //
T02TD2185E:52a-6: 'khor sogs snod ni mdzes pa ru //
T02TD2185E:52a-7: 'o ma dang bcas sman rnams kyis //
T02TD2185E:52a-8: bkang ste mdun du bzhag pa'o //
T02TD2185E:52a-10: 'o ma'i nang du klu sman sna tshogs pa blugs la gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2185E:52a-11: de steng gzhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
T02TD2185E:52a-12: rdzas gong du bsags pa de rnams la bya'o //
T02TD2185E:52a-13: rdzas de rnams gang la dbul bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2185E:52a-14: shin tu gsal byed gdan stengs su //
T02TD2185E:52a-15: nga ldan mtha' yas sbrul dgu pa //
T02TD2185E:52a-16: zhes bya ba ni mdun du rgya mtsho chen po bsams pa'i nang du /
T02TD2185E:52a-17: phu:las klu mtha' yas sku mdog ser po /
T02TD2185E:52a-18: phyag gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba /
T02TD2185E:52a-19: dbul sbrul mgo dgu yod pa /
T02TD2185E:52a-20: sbrul 'khyil pa lnga'i steng na bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02TD2185E:52a-21: h'um las phyag na rdo rje chu las nya ldang pa'i tshul du dgrongs kyis bskyed do //
T02TD2185E:52a-22: sku mdog mthing ga / dbus skra thor tshugs gcig tu bcings pa /
T02TD2185E:52a-23: zhal bgrad pa mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02TD2185E:52a-26: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2185E:52a-27: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par bsams la ;
T02TD2185E:52a-29: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang /
T02TD2185E:52a-31: de la mchod pa'i yan lag dang /
T02TD2185E:52a-32: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod bstod /
T02TD2185E:52a-33: aom a'a:h'um gsum gyis gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs /
T02TD2185E:52a-34: de nas klu la mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2185E:52a-35: rtsi sman mchod cing mdun gnas pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T02TD2185E:52a-36: gong du bskyed pa'i klu la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bcing bstims la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod do //
T02TD2185E:52a-37: de nas sngags brjod cing 'o ma dang bcas rtsi sman gyis mchod do //
T02TD2185E:52a-38: klu'i nad dang gdug rtsub thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig ces brjod cing bstod do //
T02TD2185E:52a-39: de nas sngags 'di bdun 'bum du bzlas so //
T02TD2185E:52a-40: aom badzra nyi ma sa bla na klad pa nam /
T02TD2185E:52a-43: tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer /
T02TD2185E:52a-44: dus bzhi'i mchod pa rgyun du bya'o //
T02TD2185E:52a-45: klu yi gtor ma dus bzhir btang /
T02TD2185E:52a-46: mtha' ma rtags byung ba dang /
T02TD2185E:52b-0: las kyi mtha' brtul @52b bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2185E:52b-1: bdag rnal 'byor pa sdang mig tu blta zhing /
T02TD2185E:52b-3: bdag phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal du gnas la /
T02TD2185E:52b-4: mdun du gru gsum mthing nag brus la /
T02TD2185E:52b-5: ngar phye la sogs pa'i rdzas la ling+ga byas la //
T02TD2185E:52b-6: ming rus gro ga'am shing shun la bris la gzhug go //
T02TD2185E:52b-7: de sbal pa nag po dang lto sbyar la tshon skud kyis dkris la gru gsum du gzhug go //
T02TD2185E:52b-8: de'i bla dgug par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2185E:52b-9: yang lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas la gong gi ling+ga la bstim mo zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2185E:52b-10: sngags ni aom badzra nyi ma sa bal na'i rting la badzra aam ku sha dza:zhes pas dgug pa'o ;
T02TD2185E:52b-11: / de nas dgra bgegs bsgral ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2185E:52b-12: seng ldeng gi phur pas gdab cing brub par bya zhes pa ni /
T02TD2185E:52b-13: lag tu nyungs kar blangs la /
T02TD2185E:52b-14: nyi ma sa bal na'i rting la che ge mo m'a ra ya rbad ces bzlas shing /
T02TD2185E:52b-15: gru gsum du nyungs kar brab bo /
T02TD2185E:52b-16: seng ldeng gi phur pas dril zhing /
T02TD2185E:52b-17: nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la /
T02TD2185E:52b-18: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya /
T02TD2185E:52b-19: che ge mo m'a ra ya sarba bighn'an bam h'um phat /
T02TD2185E:52b-21: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad la //
T02TD2185E:52b-22: de nas thal mo brdab cing nad dang gdon bgegs thams cad brlag par bsam mo zhes pa ni /
T02TD2185E:52b-23: thal mo brdab cing gdon bgegs stong phrag brgyad cu /
T02TD2185E:52b-24: sku la bsngo ba'i dgra thams cad dang /
T02TD2185E:52b-25: rnam par shes pa dbang du bsdus shing lus rdul phran du rlogs shig ces brjod do //
T02TD2185E:52b-26: de nas las kyi mtha' brtul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2185E:52b-27: bsreg mnan bskyar ba nyams dang sbyar //
T02TD2185E:52b-29: thab khung rnying pa'am sar par gdug pa can gyi shing la me btang la /
T02TD2185E:52b-31: mnan pa bskyar ba kun man ngag bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2185E:52b-32: bsnyen pa'i rim pa bstan pa'o /
T02TD2185E:52b-34: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:52b-36: lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa nas //
T02TD2185E:52b-37: rig sngags gsangs sngags kun gyi bdag po ste //
T02TD2185E:52b-38: logs 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2185E:52b-39: bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2185E:52b-40: klu chen rgyal po mtha' yas ni //
T02TD2185E:52b-41: sku mdog ljang gu sna tshogs mdog /
T02TD2185E:53a-0: @53a * // phyag gnyis thal sbyar rin chen 'dzin //
T02TD2185E:53a-1: sbrul mgo dgu yi btsun mo yis //
T02TD2185E:53a-3: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2185E:53a-4: bdud rtsi zil dngar sman gyis mchod //
T02TD2185E:53a-5: klu yi gdug rtsub zhi gyur cig / aom n'a ga badzra pu shpe h'um /
T02TD2185E:53a-6: aom n'a ge badzra dh'u pe h'um /
T02TD2185E:53a-7: aom n'a ga badzra a'a lo ke hr'i:/ aom n'a ga badzra gandhe gam //
T02TD2185E:53a-8: aom n'a badzra nee bi dye h'um /
T02TD2185E:53a-9: aom n'a ga badzra bo dha ka re h'um /
T02TD2185E:53a-10: bstod pa dang mchod pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:53a-12: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:53a-14: mandala gru bzhi pa cig byas la ;
T02TD2185E:53a-15: de'i steng du lnga ldan mtha' yas sbrul rgyu ba'i gzugs dang /
T02TD2185E:53a-17: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2185E:53a-19: yungs kar la sogs ba'i rdzas dang /
T02TD2185E:53a-20: dri mi zhim pa sna tshogs bsag go //
T02TD2185E:53a-21: rabs cad kyi thod pa mtshan ngan cig gi nang du /
T02TD2185E:53a-26: de rnams kyi khrag blugs so //
T02TD2185E:53a-27: thod pa'i phyi rol du yang bsku'o //
T02TD2185E:53a-29: khrag phyed phyed dong chung du yang blugs la /
T02TD2185E:53a-30: zor thun gyi rdzas su gzhag go //
T02TD2185E:53a-31: thod pa'i nang du ser ba byung ba'i chu yang blugs so //
T02TD2185E:53a-32: thod pa de yugs sa mo'i dor rtas dril la mandala gyi byang shar du gru gsum gyi steng du gzhag go //
T02TD2185E:53a-33: 'gram du seng ldeng gi phur pa cig kyang gzhug go //
T02TD2185E:53a-34: de nas phyag na rdo rje bskyed la mchod pa dang /
T02TD2185E:53a-36: sngags bzlas pa kun bsnyen pa ltar bya'o //
T02TD2185E:53a-37: de nas las la sbyor ka ni /
T02TD2185E:53a-40: thod pa dong chung du ser rta'i nang du yungs kar la sogs pa'i thun brdeg go //
T02TD2185E:53a-41: nyi mas bla na ser ba phob /
T02TD2185E:53a-42: klad pa nan ser ba phob /
T02TD2185E:53a-44: tsitta ku li nan ser ba phob //
T02TD2185E:53a-45: tsi tra mutra ser ba phob /
T02TD2185E:53a-47: n'a ga hril hril ser ba phob //
T02TD2185E:53a-48: n'a ga phrom ser ba phob /
T02TD2185E:53a-49: n'a ga phob ser ba phob ces bzlas so //
T02TD2185E:53a-50: sngags de rnams yi ger bris pa thod par gzhug go //
T02TD2185E:53a-51: de nas skabs skabs su gtor ma gtong ngo //
T02TD2185E:53a-52: de nas thod pa khyer la yul gyi chu mig gam /
T02TD2185E:53b-0: lha @53b tho'i rtsar song la gser skyems gtang //
T02TD2185E:53b-1: lha 'dre la dmod btsugs la thod pa gzhag go //
T02TD2185E:53b-2: 'gram du phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la gzugs so //
T02TD2185E:53b-3: de nas dong chung gi khrag dum ka yang gtor ro //
T02TD2185E:53b-4: de nas dong chung gi khrag la khrag dum ka yang bsnan la /
T02TD2185E:53b-5: gong bzhin zor sgrub zhag lnga'am drug tu bya'o //
T02TD2185E:53b-6: de nas rtag tu sngas su bcug la thun brdeg go //
T02TD2185E:53b-7: de nas dgra'i yul du phyin la /
T02TD2185E:53b-8: zhing thog dang ser rta'i thog tu zor 'phang ngo //
T02TD2185E:53b-10: yul 'dir sngags bzlas shing ser ba phob bya'o //
T02TD2185E:53b-11: ser ba dbab pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:53b-13: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:53b-14: ser ba bsrung bar 'dod na mandala mchod pa gong bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2185E:53b-18: lag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2185E:53b-19: nyi ma sa bla'i rting la badzra pra be sha ya phat /
T02TD2185E:53b-20: sa 'di srungs shig byer ya zhes 'bum tsam bzlas so //
T02TD2185E:53b-21: skabs su gtor ma gtang ngo //
T02TD2185E:53b-22: thal chen dang ske tshe ras kyi khung du phur la phur pa'i ske la gdags so //
T02TD2185E:53b-23: phur pa khyer la yul phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du lha ma srin sde brgyad la phur pa btab par dmigs la tho gzugs so //
T02TD2185E:53b-24: de nas ser ba byung na /
T02TD2185E:53b-25: ser ba 'od ba'i phyogs su thal chen dang ske tshe 'phang zhing sngags bzlas /
T02TD2185E:53b-26: g-yas g-yon du mdzub ris byas la bsrung ngo //
T02TD2185E:53b-28: rang gi lag pa g-yas g-yon du /
T02TD2185E:53b-29: bsrung ba'i zhing yul bsams la /
T02TD2185E:53b-31: ser ba pha ri la 'phangs par bsam mo ;
T02TD2185E:53b-32: / sngags ni nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la /
T02TD2185E:53b-34: sa 'di srungs shig byer ya bya'o //
T02TD2185E:53b-35: des ser ba thub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2185E:53b-36: ser ba bsrung ba'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:53b-38: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:53b-40: klu'i rten sa chu mig gi bkab ni dma' bar sbra phub la mandala bya /
T02TD2185E:53b-41: phyag na rdo rje dang lnga ldan sprul dgu pa mchod pa dang /
T02TD2185E:53b-42: bstod pa byas la gzugs gdon /
T02TD2185E:53b-45: de nas mdun du grug gsum brus la /
T02TD2185E:53b-46: bag phye las klu'i gzugs byas la gzhag go //
T02TD2185E:54a-0: de nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo @54a * //
T02TD2185E:54a-2: seng ldeng gi phur pa thogs la /
T02TD2185E:54a-3: nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la /
T02TD2185E:54a-7: char pa phob ces mang du bzlas so //
T02TD2185E:54a-8: klu'i spyi bor phur pa btab la char pa phob ces bya'o //
T02TD2185E:54a-10: de nas dong sas bkab la char pa phob ces bya'o //
T02TD2185E:54a-11: dus dus bslang zhes bya ba bi /
T02TD2185E:54a-12: zhag re lon zhing chu mig la yar yar spra phra phub la mandala dang /
T02TD2185E:54a-13: de ltar nub re re zhing re re bya'o //
T02TD2185E:54a-14: zhag bdun pa la chu mig gi thog tu sbra phub la mandala dang mchod bstod la sogs pa gong bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2185E:54a-15: klu'i gzugs la sngags bzlas la phur pa gdab po //
T02TD2185E:54a-19: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:54a-24: bstod pa kun gong bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2185E:54a-25: mdun du dong gru gsum brus la /
T02TD2185E:54a-26: dong gi nang du bag phye las klu'i gzugs byas la gzhug go //
T02TD2185E:54a-29: tshon skud sna lnga las sngags mdud byas pa dang /
T02TD2185E:54a-30: seng ldeng gi phur pa dang /
T02TD2185E:54a-31: de rnams la lhar bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2185E:54a-32: mchod bstod byas la sngags 'di bzlas so ;
T02TD2185E:54a-33: / nyi ma sa bla na klad pa nam /
T02TD2185E:54a-34: ku na zhi tsitta ku linam /
T02TD2185E:54a-39: n'a ga ha na ha na /
T02TD2185E:54a-40: n'a ga ha na ha na m'a ra ya rbad nam zhes grangs mang du bzlas la /
T02TD2185E:54a-42: gla rtsi lus kun du bsku /
T02TD2185E:54a-44: mdun du dong gru gsum brus la /
T02TD2185E:54a-45: bag phye las klu'i gzugs byas te bcug la /
T02TD2185E:54a-46: de la bdag la gnod pa'i klu dgug gzhug bya /
T02TD2185E:54a-47: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed la phur pa dril zhing sngags bzlas la /
T02TD2185E:54a-48: seng ldeng gi phur pa klu la gdab bo /
T02TD2185E:54a-49: de nas klu'i gzugs de'i thod par bcug la /
T02TD2185E:54a-50: lha khang gi them pa'i 'og tu mnan no //
T02TD2185E:54a-51: dus thams cad du lha'i nga rgyal du byas la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2185E:54a-52: bsrung ba'i cho ga bla na med pa'i dis ci 'dra ba yang thub bo //
T02TD2185E:54a-55: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:54b-0: sa bdag gnod pa bzlog par 'dod @54b na bsnyen pa gong bzhin du bya /
T02TD2185E:54b-1: mandala dang mchod pa kun byas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-2: mdun du dong gru gsum brus la nad du bag phye las sa bdag gi gzugs byas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-3: tshon skud kyis ske nas btags la gzhug / rdzas la tshil chen dang /
T02TD2185E:54b-4: tshon skud sna lnga las sngags mdud byas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-6: seng ldang gi phur pa la sngags 'di bdun 'bum bzlas //
T02TD2185E:54b-8: nyi mas bla na'i rting la /
T02TD2185E:54b-12: sa dom nag po nan zhes bzlas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-14: sngags mdud lus la gdags la /
T02TD2185E:54b-15: gla rtsis lus kun du bkru /
T02TD2185E:54b-16: seng ldeng gi phur pa la sngags 'di bdun 'bum bzlas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-17: sa bdag gi snying gar gdab /
T02TD2185E:54b-18: sa bdag thod par bcug la mchod rten gyi 'og tu mnan /
T02TD2185E:54b-19: dus thams cad du gong bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2185E:54b-20: sa bdag bzlog pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:54b-22: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:54b-24: btsan dang 'byung po phal pa'i gnod pa bzlog par 'dod na /
T02TD2185E:54b-25: sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-30: mdun du dngo gru gsum brus la /
T02TD2185E:54b-31: ngar zan las 'byung po'i gzugs byas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-32: tshon skud kyis ske nas btags la nang du gzhug go //
T02TD2185E:54b-33: gnod pa'i 'byung po de la dgug gzhug byas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-34: bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal du gnas te /
T02TD2185E:54b-35: phur pa dang yungs kar la sngags 'di bzlas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-36: 'byung po la yungs kar gyi thun brdeg / nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la phyug tsi phat /
T02TD2185E:54b-38: lce ba ti phat ces nus tshad bzlas la //
T02TD2185E:54b-39: 'byung po'i gzugs thod par bcug la /
T02TD2185E:54b-40: mchod rten gyi 'og tu mnan no //
T02TD2185E:54b-41: skrang 'bur byung ba la yang gdab bo //
T02TD2185E:54b-42: bdud dang ma mo dang btsan dang /
T02TD2185E:54b-43: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:54b-45: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:54b-46: kun du bsrung ba 'di khyad par du rgyal po la bya'o //
T02TD2185E:54b-47: bsnyen pa gong du byas la /
T02TD2185E:54b-51: mdun du dong gru gsum du /
T02TD2185E:54b-52: ngar zan las rgyal po'i gzugs byas la bcug la tshon skud kyis ske nas gdags so //
T02TD2185E:55a-4: thal chen la sngags 'di bzlas pa mang du bya'o //
T02TD2185E:55a-6: nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la /
T02TD2185E:55a-8: di n'a ga bar ma pa la se to ye zhes bzlas la /
T02TD2185E:55a-9: gzugs la yungs kar la sogs pa'i thun brdeg go //
T02TD2185E:55a-10: snying gar phur pa btab pa thod par bcug la /
T02TD2185E:55a-12: rgyal po bzlog pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:55a-14: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:55a-15: kun du srung bar byed na /
T02TD2185E:55a-19: nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la /
T02TD2185E:55a-25: ha na ha na m'a ra ya rbad nan zhes mang du bzlas la //
T02TD2185E:55a-26: thun dang mnan pa kun gong bzhin bya'o //
T02TD2185E:55a-27: thams cad bsrung ba'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:55a-29: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:55a-30: 'gong pos gnod na 'di ltar bya ste /
T02TD2185E:55a-31: sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2185E:55a-32: mdun du dong gru gsum brus la /
T02TD2185E:55a-33: dong gi nang du ngar zan lnga bcug la tshon skud kyis ske nas btags la gzhag go //
T02TD2185E:55a-34: gang gnod pa'i 'gong po bris la lus la gzhug / de nas mandala byas la /
T02TD2185E:55a-36: mchod bstod byas la sngags bzlas so //
T02TD2185E:55a-37: nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la /
T02TD2185E:55a-38: mgo ste sa ste nan zhes mang du bzlas la thun brdeg go //
T02TD2185E:55a-39: phur pa btab la thod par gzhug //
T02TD2185E:55a-40: rab gnas byas pa'i mchod rten 'og tu mnan no //
T02TD2185E:55a-41: phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal dang stang stabs kyi sa mtshams bcad do //
T02TD2185E:55a-42: 'gong po thams cad bzlog pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:55a-44: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:55a-45: kun du bsrung ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2185E:55a-46: sngags pa gzhan gyi sbod gtong bsrung bar 'dod na /
T02TD2185E:55a-47: sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2185E:55a-48: de nas mandala bya ba dang /
T02TD2185E:55a-51: mandala gyi steng du mchod rten nag po khong stong brtsigs pa'i nang du kho'i gzugs bag zan las byas la /
T02TD2185E:55a-52: ming rus bcug la gzhag go //
T02TD2185E:55a-53: bum pa'i nang du phyag na rdo rje bag zan las byas la gzhug go //
T02TD2185E:55a-54: rdo rjes de'i lus 'gems par bsam mo //
T02TD2185E:55a-55: mchod rten gyi 'og tu dong gru gsum brus la /
T02TD2185E:55b-0: de'i nang du yang kho'i gzugs @55b dang ;
T02TD2185E:55b-2: sprul dang sbal pa gnyis kyi lto bar bcug la /
T02TD2185E:55b-3: klu lnga ldan sbrul dgu pas za bar bsam mo /
T02TD2185E:55b-4: de thod par bcug la gru gsum du gzhug / lan cig gzhung bzhin du mnan par bya'o //
T02TD2185E:55b-5: bdag rang phyag na rdo rjer bsams la /
T02TD2185E:55b-6: phur pa 'dril zhing sngags bzlas pas /
T02TD2185E:55b-7: kho'i srung ma bdag gi bka' nyan cing las byed par bsam mo //
T02TD2185E:55b-8: bdag gis rbad pas kho rang gi srog gcod par bsam mo //
T02TD2185E:55b-9: de nas thun rdzas dang phur pa rnams bsags la /
T02TD2185E:55b-12: sngags ni nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la /
T02TD2185E:55b-13: bar ma ma h'a a'a:h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes 'grub tshad bzlas /
T02TD2185E:55b-14: bskor ba phyin ci log tu bya /
T02TD2185E:55b-15: thun brdeg / mnan zor gyi mtha' brtul lo //
T02TD2185E:55b-16: sbod gtong thams cad bzlog pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:55b-18: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:55b-19: mdun du 'brub khung gru gsum du ;
T02TD2185E:55b-20: / dgra dang bgegs kyi ling+ge gzhug / dgra yi ling+ga rkang rjes dang //
T02TD2185E:55b-21: dri ma phyi sa gcin las bya'o //
T02TD2185E:55b-22: rabs cad thod par bcug nas ni //
T02TD2185E:55b-23: thod pa yugs sa'i zhabs mas dril //
T02TD2185E:55b-24: de yang re ba'i steng du gzhag /'gram du dug rdzas sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2185E:55b-25: drag po'i rdzas rnams bzhag nas ni ;
T02TD2185E:55b-26: / skabs su dug thun rdzas thun brdeg / de yi 'gram du mandala te //
T02TD2185E:55b-27: bzed zhal mchod pa rnam lnga bsham //
T02TD2185E:55b-28: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02TD2185E:55b-29: lnga ldan bskyed cing spyan drangs dang //
T02TD2185E:55b-30: mchod dang bstod dang gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2185E:55b-31: de nas sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni //
T02TD2185E:55b-34: kun zhi tsitta ku li nam /
T02TD2185E:55b-35: tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer /
T02TD2185E:55b-36: thum ril rbad che ge mo m'a ra ya dza:rbad nam /
T02TD2185E:55b-38: skabs skabs su aag tshe ba na mar thun brdeg go //
T02TD2185E:55b-39: de ltar byas nas thod pa khyer la /
T02TD2185E:55b-46: chu gling la mnan ba gzhung bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2185E:55b-47: dgra dang bgegs kyi ling+ga bca' ba'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:55b-49: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:56a-0: dgra gsad pa'i rim pa ni dang por bdag rnal 'byor pa'i mdun du mdzub @56a * //
T02TD2185E:56a-1: gang pa'i 'brub khung gru gsum brus te /
T02TD2185E:56a-2: dur khrod kyi sol bas nag por byug go //
T02TD2185E:56a-3: de'i nang du dgra bo'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang /
T02TD2185E:56a-4: bag phye las singga byas la /
T02TD2185E:56a-5: ming byang bcug la gru gsum du gzhug / de'i khar g-yam pa sngon po cig la //
T02TD2185E:56a-6: yung ba ser pos ri rab dang /
T02TD2185E:56a-7: rdo rje rgya gram gyi gzugs bris la /
T02TD2185E:56a-9: 'gram du bzed zhal dang mchod pa rnam lnga bshams la /
T02TD2185E:56a-10: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2185E:56a-11: mdun du lnga ldan bskyed cing spyan drangs /
T02TD2185E:56a-15: gu gul dag gis lha dang dbral /
T02TD2185E:56a-16: thun gyi rdzas rnams bsags nas ni /
T02TD2185E:56a-17: drag po'i sngags ni bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2185E:56a-19: klad pa nam ku na zhi /
T02TD2185E:56a-21: tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer /
T02TD2185E:56a-22: thum ril rbad che ge mo m'a ra ya dza: rbad nam zhes 'bum bzlas /
T02TD2185E:56a-23: de nas lingga'i mgo bcad la //
T02TD2185E:56a-24: mgo dang lingga sar pa gnyis //
T02TD2185E:56a-25: rabs chad thod pa'i nang du gzhug / mnan pa sgrub pa tshul bzhin bya //
T02TD2185E:56a-26: lha 'dre gnas pa'i sa ru gzhug / lingga'i lus dang gsar pa gnyis //
T02TD2185E:56a-27: ral gris gtu bas la drag po'i rdzas dang gdug pa can gyi shing la sbyin sreg tshul bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2185E:56a-28: dgra la bya ba'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:56a-30: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:56a-31: sbyin sreg byed na sla ba'am thab khung rnying pa ru /
T02TD2185E:56a-32: brgya'am yang na lnga bzhi gcig / bskyar zhing las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2185E:56a-33: gdug pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs dang /
T02TD2185E:56a-34: mar nag tshil chen ske tshe dang //
T02TD2185E:56a-35: til dang ming byad spel te bsreg / me lha bskyed la sbyin sreg dbul //
T02TD2185E:56a-36: sngags ni nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la che ge mo raksha sh'antim ku ru m'a ra ya rbad ces pas /
T02TD2185E:56a-38: dri mi zhim pa sna tshogs dang /
T02TD2185E:56a-39: drag po'i rdzas sna tshogs dang /
T02TD2185E:56a-40: mar nag la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2185E:56a-41: ting nge 'dzin dgra bgegs gang yin par mos par byas la //
T02TD2185E:56a-42: rdzas re dang sngags re bstun zhing sbyin sreg bya'o phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2185E:56a-47: de nas me lha bskyed la spyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2185E:56a-48: drag po dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi rim pa'o /
T02TD2185E:56b-0: // / @56b bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2185E:56b-1: gru gsum nyis 'gyur bris la nang thal ba 'jam pos byug / kha rtsang dmar gyis bskor /
T02TD2185E:56b-2: nyi ma sa bla na la sogs pa la 'di gdags so //
T02TD2185E:56b-5: ha na ha na m'a ra ya rbad nan /
T02TD2185E:56b-7: sprul lta bu'i rjes byung na 'gong po yin /
T02TD2185E:56b-8: bong bu'i rjes byung na 'gong po yin //
T02TD2185E:56b-9: au ma pa'i bshags pa 'dra ba byung na rgyal po yin /
T02TD2185E:56b-10: shing lo lta bu'i rjes sam ral pa bsnyigs pa lta bu'i rjes byung na bdud yin /
T02TD2185E:56b-11: mda' mang po bzhag pa 'dra ba'i rjes byung na btsan yin /
T02TD2185E:56b-12: phug ron gyi bya bra'i rjes 'dra ba'am ;
T02TD2185E:56b-13: lcags thag sprel ba'i rjes byung na ma mo yin /
T02TD2185E:56b-14: de rnams gang byung ba dang las la sbyar ro //
T02TD2185E:56b-15: rdo rje lce dbab kyi 'grel pa mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rim pa /
T02TD2185E:56b-16: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2185E:56b-18: // / slad kyi pandi ta dza y'a ka ra dang ;
T02TD2185E:56b-19: lo ts'a ba mar pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
